entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 27. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 27. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
